name: That'll Do Pig
description:
Enter a world of happy pigs gorging themselves on pizza, root beer, and video games. When things go wrong you will be called upon to defeat the MEGA PIG and restore balance to the pig pen.

Keyboard Controls

A/D or Left/Right arrow to dodge left and right.
Space Bar to jump.
Left Click to shoot.

Gamepad Controls

Left/Right stick to dodge left and right.
A Button to jump.
Right Trigger to shoot.

This is a jam game that is still in development.
Submission for the Summer Slow Jams 2022: Boss Fight
